column5: Hey everyone,  I have to head to Grand Bend for work today and I was just wondering if there were any good tackle shops in the area I could stop in and have a look around ?  Or if there was anything in the area... ya know, a 20 mins drive or so from the Bend !  Thanks !

There's a bait shop about 20 minutes drive down hwy 21. Its a gas station but they got a few lures and worms. Its just next to the Ausable river in the town of Port franks .... the corner of hwy 21 and Northville rd.
